title: Chamizal National Memorial: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information | Información Básica           Physical Address           800 South San Marcial Street  El Paso, TX 79905                 Directions         From the west take exit 21 off of I-10 toward Piedras Street. Turn right onto Piedras and follow it to Paisano Drive. Turn left onto Paisano and then turn right onto San Marcial Street. From the north take exit 20A off of US-54 for US-62 toward Paisano Drive. Turn right onto Paisano and follow it until you reach San Marcial Street. From the east take exit 22B on I-10 toward US-54. Stay left until two lanes merge, move into the right lane toward Paisano Drive. Turn right at the light and merge onto Paisano.   Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Entrance Gates / Grounds The Memorial grounds are open to vehicle and foot traffic only while the gates are open.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM   Monday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM   Tuesday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM   Wednesday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM   Thursday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM   Friday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM   Saturday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM      Additional Information View More       Christmas Day:  Closed      New Year’s Day:  Closed      Thanksgiving Day:  Closed                 Weather           Chamizal National Memorial is open year-round, but periodic winter weather conditions may cause closure. Please check for alerts on the park website: www.nps.gov/cham. Thunderstorms typically occur during summer and early fall. There may be no shelter to avoid lightning, so please prepare by looking at weather forecasts and paying attention to developing weather conditions.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Chamizal Entrance and Sponsored Programs - $0.00 Chamizal National Memorial is a fee-free park.  There is no entrance fee for the park grounds or Cultural Center exhibit. Programs and events sponsored or presented by the Memorial's park rangers are free to the general public.         Visitor Centers       Chamizal National Memorial Cultural Center The Cultural Center is located on the grounds of Chamizal National Memorial and includes the theater, exhibit areas, park store and visitor information desk. The Franklin G. Smith Gallery, also open to visitors, is located next door in the Administrative Office Building.               Chamizal National Memorial is located near downtown El Paso, right on the Mexican border across from Ciudad Juarez.  It encompasses about 55 acres and includes walking and bike trails, picnic areas, restrooms, amphitheater, parking lot, administrative offices, and a cultural center.
